dialogue.text: After a long day, everyone went to go get some shuteye.
Everyone had nice dreams, but Adelaide/'s dream was one of the most classic ones.
The year was 1919. The war was over, and people were ready for the Roaring Twenties.
Princess Adelaide, as the royal member she is, brings a younger Carl into a music duel, unaware of what would happen.
Some could say this was not part of history, but when people are dreaming, fiction might turn into reality at some point.
